feedback.fit: The fitted top and flared skirt create a balanced, flattering silhouette. The lengths work well together.
feedback.color: The yellow and black color scheme is eye-catching but the large amount of black weighs it down a bit.
feedback.footwear: The black pumps coordinate well and add a slightly dressier element to the outfit.
feedback.accessories: Some simple jewelry like a pendant necklace or bangle could elevate the look without being overbearing.
feedback.style: Overall it's a cute, youthful casual look that could work for many occasions with some small tweaks.

feedback.fit: The loose fit is comfortable for summer but lacks shape and definition. A more fitted top or shorts could improve the silhouette.
feedback.color: The blue patterned top adds nice visual interest. The neutral khaki shorts are versatile.
feedback.footwear: The brown wedges work with the casual outfit but a lighter, brighter sandal could be more summery.
feedback.accessories: A long pendant necklace, hat, or sunglasses could complete the breezy summer look.
feedback.style: It's a decent casual summer outfit but could use some tweaks for a more intentional, polished style.

feedback.fit: The fit and flare silhouette is very flattering, feminine and retro-inspired. Great proportions.
feedback.color: The mustard yellow is a beautiful, less common color that pairs great with the crisp white top.
feedback.footwear: The black wedge sandals ground the outfit and add a slightly edgy contrast to the sweet look.
feedback.accessories: The pearl necklace is the perfect classic, feminine touch to complete the retro style.
feedback.style: Absolutely lovely, cohesive retro look with a modern twist. Youthful yet sophisticated.

feedback.fit: The loose, flowy fit is comfortable for summer but lacks definition. A more fitted top could improve the shape.
feedback.color: The monochromatic fuchsia is bold but a bit overwhelming. Introducing another color could provide balance.
feedback.footwear: The nude wedges get a bit lost. A contrasting shoe color could anchor the look better.
feedback.accessories: The shell necklace adds a nice boho touch. More accessories like bangles or a headband could complete the style.
feedback.style: It's an eye-catching bohemian look but needs some editing for better balance and intentionality.

feedback.fit: The relaxed fit of the top balances the short skirt for an effortless look. Tucking or tying the shirt could also work.
feedback.color: The light blue and white create a fresh, feminine palette. The cognac brown accessories add earthy warmth.
feedback.footwear: The cowboy boots add a rustic flair that toughens up the lace skirt in an unexpected, stylish way.
feedback.accessories: The matching leather belt and satchel pull the look together beautifully and enhance the rustic vibe.
feedback.style: Love this combo of feminine and rustic elements for a unique, fashionable summer look. Very well accessorized.

labels.top_type: Red wrap top with short sleeves

feedback.fit: The wrap top accentuates the waist beautifully and the A-line skirt skims over the hips for a gorgeous silhouette.
feedback.color: The monochromatic red is bold, sexy and striking. It commands attention in the best way.
feedback.footwear: The brown strappy wedges complement the red hue and elongate the legs. Nude would also work well.
feedback.accessories: The gold bangle and watch add a touch of glam without competing with the red. Very chic.
feedback.style: This is how you do casual chic! The monochrome palette and classic pieces create a timeless, confident look.

feedback.fit: The loose, draped fit creates beautiful movement and an effortless Grecian goddess vibe.
feedback.color: The monochromatic coral is fresh and vibrant - perfect for summer. It looks stunning with her skin tone.
feedback.footwear: The brown platform sandals work okay but a metallic or nude strappy sandal could elevate the look even more.
feedback.accessories: The gold statement necklace and bangle are the perfect glam touches to dress up the flowy silhouette.
feedback.style: Gorgeous, effortless summer style with a Grecian flair. The statement accessories really make the look.

feedback.fit: The loose, flowy fit suits the bohemian style but could use more waist definition for added shape.
feedback.color: The lime green is certainly eye-catching but head-to-toe is a bit overwhelming. Adding a neutral could help.
feedback.footwear: The black platform sandals ground the look and add a touch of boho glam.
feedback.accessories: The black beaded statement necklace complements the shoes and breaks up the lime green a bit.
feedback.style: It's a fun bohemian look for summer but needs some minor tweaks to take it to the next level.

feedback.fit: The loose tee and fitted shorts create a relaxed, balanced silhouette. The shorts could be slightly longer for better proportions.
feedback.color: The purple and pink color scheme is fun and youthful. The graphic tee adds a nice casual element.
feedback.footwear: The multicolored platform wedges are a perfect statement piece to jazz up the outfit. They tie in the colors well.
feedback.accessories: The beaded bracelets enhance the eclectic vibe. A long pendant necklace could also work well here.
feedback.style: This is a cute, quirky casual look that expresses personal style. The shoes really elevate the basic separates.

feedback.fit: The loose, boxy fit of the tee overwhelms her figure, especially with the longer shorts. A more fitted or tucked top could help.
feedback.color: The black and pink is a decent color combo but the busy patterns compete with each other a bit.
feedback.footwear: The brown sandals are okay but get lost in the look. A brighter or bolder shoe could be more impactful.
feedback.accessories: This casual outfit is crying out for accessories! A statement necklace, hat, and bracelets could take it up a notch.
feedback.style: It's a basic casual summer look but lacks polish and intention. With tweaks to fit and accessories it could be more stylish.
